question: 蒼白
sourceMnemonic: If you're <kanji>pale</kanji> <kanji>white</kanji>, you're <vocabulary>pale</vocabulary>, or <vocabulary>pallid</vocabulary>. This word is usually used to talk about the <vocabulary>pallor</vocabulary> of someone's face.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word and uses the on'yomi for both kanji. You learned those readings with the kanji, so you should be able to read this on your own.
